All Natural Energy Supplement - Boost energy levels - Increase focus - Increase creativity - Improves memory retention - Bronchodilator (helps improve airflow to lungs) The powerful botanical terpenes in Papilio's all natural energy supplement blend have been specifically formulated to improve mental function and boost energy levels. Our Yoga + Meditation Blend is useful to assist with: - Exercise - Study/Learning - Work - Meditation/Yoga - Video game performance - Breathing - Concentration issues Ingredients: Organic Alpha Pinene + Organic BCP Oil + Organic Limonene + Organic Hemp Oil Dosage: Half the dropper, dispensed under the tongue, 2 times per day Results: Generally experienced within 15 minutes. For long lasting effects, please read the label on your bottle carefully. Size: 30ml (lasts 1-2 months)
